name: Astrobuddy
description: Astro-Buddy, no one knows how old he is or where he comes from. But what is known is that he likes to surround himself with humans. That's why you'll often find him and his space friends at big events around the world. The NFTs he hands out there are meant to remind you of the good times and great experiences like digital souvenirs. Do you already have an Astro Buddy on your wallet?
